SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.created_time as createdTime, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id
WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
